short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find relevant search results by only displaying content from Reddit in Google

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you have trouble finding relevant search results on Google among ads, sponsored content? Use this extension to quickly display search results from Reddit only!
